Articles.Content:
Hello, totally new to the forum. I have been, however, toying around in KSP for about 6 months. Love the game, way more than most games I've played in many years. Anyway, here is the bug I'm experiencing, sorry if it has been addressed I did extensive searching before posting I promise. 

Specifically in the Chaka Monkey, Mark IV, and Panopticon mods I have attachment nodes that simply won't allow attachment or attach to anything, or if they do it is on the wrong side of the node (with the part clipping) and no other parts can be added. Now I know these are 0.90 compatible and not yet updated for 1.0.x and honestly I wasn't using them in 0.90 so I can't confirm or deny if they ever worked properly. 

At first I suspected my PC to be the problem, but I'm now sure it's not consistently the PC. I have done extensive web searches and even tried to wrap my head around the node attach rules in the wiki. I suspect something has changed in 1.0.x regarding attachment rules that is causing this. If anyone has some insite on how to fix it, that would be great, or if someone wants to help me understand the wiki documentation better so I can experiment myself that would be awesome too. 

TIA, 

A.A.
Hi Aaron Also, Squad have enforced part attachment direction with nodes now, but many old parts have nodes pointing the wrong way, you can disable this in the Alt+F12 debug menu.
The next version of Chaka monkey, which will be available soon, has fixed nodes on every part.

**FIXED**

Awesome Awesome Awesome

That fixed the problem entirely. Now to poke around with the node rule and see if I can better understand how they work. 

Thanks again for your help.
